examples: Both teams chanced their arms at every opportunity.
Several chances came our way
The home side had a chance to take the lead.
I had the chance to taste mangosteen during my trip to Thailand.
Simon had an eye for the chance.
words.defineEn: a possibility that something will happen
words.defineVi: một khả năng rằng một cái gì đó sẽ xảy ra

examples: A stable relationship stands the test of time.
The teaching method has stood the test of time.
The English test was no problem for Pedro.
The government is clearly testing the water, to gauge the country’s reactions to their proposals.
The test will involve answering questions about a photograph.
words.defineEn: an examination that consists of a set of questions, exercises, or activities to measure someone’s knowledge, skill, or ability
words.defineVi: một bài kiểm tra bao gồm một tập hợp các câu hỏi, bài tập hoặc hoạt động để đánh giá kiến thức, kỹ năng hoặc khả năng của ai đó

examples: The market had ripe oranges with bright orange peels.
The market had vibrant yellow lemons on display.
The market is growing rapidly.
The seafood market showcased a mouthwatering display of fresh clams.
The market vendor displayed a variety of tropical fruits, each with its own unique-colored mesocarp.
words.defineEn: a public place where people buy and sell groceries
words.defineVi: một nơi công cộng nơi mọi người mua và bán hàng tạp hóa

examples: The bullets had no effect on the steel door.
The increase had a ripple effect through the whole financial market.
The color green has a restful effect.
The law went into effect on 1 August.
The bank crash has had a ripple effect on the whole community.
words.defineEn: a change in a person or thing caused by another person or thing
words.defineVi: một sự thay đổi trong một người hoặc điều gây ra bởi một người khác hoặc điều

examples: This picture shows my mother as a young woman.
For children, picture books provide a window onto the world.
The board meeting painted a pretty grim picture.
The book paints a vivid picture of life in the city.
I have a picture frame with a family photo on my desk.
words.defineEn: a visual representation of a scene, person, etc. produced by a camera
words.defineVi: một đại diện trực quan của một cảnh, người, v.v. được tạo ra bởi một máy ảnh

examples: Programs are running a few minutes behind schedule this evening.
The conference program included a list of session titles along with their corresponding abstracts.
She can design computer programs like nobody's business.
The old government program has become a sacred cow.
The program aims to set convicts on their feet after they've been released from prison.
words.defineEn: a broadcast people watch or listen to on television or radio
words.defineVi: một chương trình phát sóng mọi người xem hoặc nghe trên truyền hình hoặc đài phát thanh

examples: Morning brought no relief from the heat.
The morning is a time of new beginnings and possibilities.
My mother waters the plants in our garden every morning.
I had a letter from my brother this morning.
I got a call from Dave this morning.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between when the sun starts to rise and the middle of the day at twelve o'clock
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày là giữa khi mặt trời bắt đầu mọc và giữa ngày lúc mười hai giờ

examples: I usually take a lunch break around noon for an hour.
Every day about noon, traffic in town grinds to a halt.
The boss was mad because Tom called it a day at noon and went home.
12:00 noon Pacific, Yahoo page goes live.
Noon, what is that?
words.defineEn: midday; 12 o’clock in the day
words.defineVi: buổi trưa; 12 giờ trong ngày

examples: The afternoon is a popular time for outdoor activities like picnics and sports.
The afternoon sun casts a warm glow on the buildings and trees.
We have a university lecture on art history this afternoon.
The weather turned quite chilly in the afternoon.
We had the run of the house for the afternoon.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between twelve o'clock and the time that the sun starts to set
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày là giữa mười hai giờ và thời gian mà mặt trời bắt đầu lặn

examples: I really love summer evenings.
The college also runs evening classes in bricklaying and joinery.
Throughout the evening, the waiter handled the busy restaurant.
The party is on Friday evening.
Programs are running a few minutes behind schedule this evening.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between the time that the sun starts to set and when the sky becomes completely dark
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày nằm giữa thời điểm mặt trời bắt đầu lặn và khi bầu trời trở nên tối hoàn toàn

examples: The night brings a sense of calm and tranquility.
The team stopped the rot with a 5–0 win last night.
They picked up the check for dinner last night.
The couple parted brass rags over their children last night.
Last night we served individual portions of chicken and mushroom aspic.
words.defineEn: the time when the sun goes down, it gets dark outside, and we sleep
words.defineVi: thời gian khi mặt trời lặn, trời tối bên ngoài, và chúng tôi ngủ

examples: Their bread and butter is reporting local events.
The event finished with a spectacular fireworks display.
These events occurred within living memory.
The tragic event tore the community out of its sense of normalcy.
The paper’s bread and butter is reporting local events in a small community.
words.defineEn: anything that takes place, particularly something important
words.defineVi: bất cứ điều gì diễn ra, đặc biệt là một cái gì đó quan trọng

examples: The news really made my day.
These dogs seldom make the news.
The news spread like wildfire.
News of interest cuts came in the nick of time for borrowers.
The news came hot on the heels of another plane crash.
words.defineEn: newly received information about recent and important events
words.defineVi: thông tin mới nhận được về các sự kiện gần đây và quan trọng

examples: Her husband had been very involved in his work.
She lost her husband in the fire.
She lost her husband in the crowd.
Her husband disappeared into thin air for years.
She introduced her husband as a successful entrepreneur during the charity event.
words.defineEn: the man you are officially married to
words.defineVi: người đàn ông bạn đã chính thức kết hôn

examples: My wife talked sense into me.
His wife drove him to Regent's Park.
He leaves a wife and two children.
As a loving husband, he surprises his wife with romantic gestures on special occasions.
My wife enjoys reading books in her free time during the week.
words.defineEn: the lady you are officially married to
words.defineVi: người phụ nữ bạn đã chính thức kết hôn

examples: My son reads twelve pages of his book every day.
My sister's son is my beloved nephew.
His son doesn't share his passion for athletics.
Your son is in high school already?
My son is coming home soon.
words.defineEn: a person's male child
words.defineVi: con trai của một người

examples: The father proudly walked his daughter down the aisle on her wedding day.
My daughter always has her head in the clouds as she walks home from school.
My daughters love gur candies that their grandfather buys for them.
My daughter enjoys homemade popsicles I make with pomegranate juice.
Their daughter is as clever as they come.
words.defineEn: a person's female child
words.defineVi: con gái của một người

examples: Education for a human being is a window to the world.
He holds strange views on education.
Education consists for him in reciting by heart and obeying.
Parents should involve themselves in their child's education.
He will be continuing his education in the US.
words.defineEn: the process that involves teaching and learning, particularly at a school, university, or college
words.defineVi: quá trình liên quan đến việc dạy và học, đặc biệt là ở trường học, trường đại học hoặc cao đẳng

examples: Election season always puts my dad's back up.
Dr. Jaffe pinned her ears back.
Right, pin back your ears, everyone.
I ran the tape back.
The enemy was driven back.
words.defineEn: the part of our body between our neck and our legs that we cannot see
words.defineVi: phần cơ thể giữa cổ và chân mà chúng ta không thể nhìn thấy

examples: This class is intense!
The college also runs evening classes in bricklaying and joinery.
Our next class will take the form of a debate.
The teacher withdrew the assignment from the class website.
The suite will add a touch of class to your bedroom.
words.defineEn: students as a whole that are taught together
words.defineVi: học sinh như một toàn thể được dạy cùng nhau

examples: They enjoyed lively conversations over dinner in the cozy dining room.
Their conversation had been largely to do with work.
I prefer deep conversations that explore meaningful topics rather than engaging in shallow small talk.
To have a chat/a conversation/a discussion/a talk.
I pulled up a chair to join the conversation.
words.defineEn: a talk that is between two or more people and they tell each other about different things like feelings, ideas, and thoughts
words.defineVi: một cuộc nói chuyện giữa hai hoặc nhiều người và họ nói với nhau về những điều khác nhau như cảm xúc, ý tưởng và suy nghĩ

examples: The lawyer presented the right argument in court.
The courts decided in favor of the New York claimants.
The court found in her favor.
The charges against the suspect will come up in court tomorrow.
The court held that such conduct violated the statute.
words.defineEn: the place in which legal trials are held
words.defineVi: nơi mà các phiên tòa pháp lý được tổ chức

examples: She went halves on gas.
Buses to Oxford run every half hour.
The journey to the airport takes about half an hour.
He never does things by halves.
I bought these shoes at half price.
words.defineEn: either of two equal parts into which something can be divided
words.defineVi: một trong hai phần bằng nhau mà một cái gì đó có thể được chia

examples: Hold this position for a count of 10.
Men still hold most positions of power in this country.
The wood is held in position by a clamp.
Put yourself in my position.
The Italian champion was in second position when he came to grief on the third lap.
words.defineEn: the place where someone or something is located in relation to other things
words.defineVi: nơi mà một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó được đặt trong mối quan hệ với những thứ khác

examples: The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The bank raised interest rates.
The sector is growing at a phenomenal rate.
Interest rates have been held at 8% for a year now.
Crime rates are soaring and our public transport system is beyond a joke.
words.defineEn: the number of times something changes or happens during a specific period of time
words.defineVi: số lần một cái gì đó thay đổi hoặc xảy ra trong một khoảng thời gian cụ thể
